value.query:
SELECT 
%vlocity_namespace%__PrimaryProducerId__r.Name,
Asset.Account.Name,
Asset.Contact.Name,
AccountId, 
ContactId, 
Description, 
Id, 
InstallDate, 
LastModifiedDate, 
Name, 
ParentId, 
Price, 
Product2Id, 
PurchaseDate, 
Quantity, 
RecordTypeId, 
RootAssetId, 
Status, 
UsageEndDate, 
%vlocity_namespace%__AmountAvailableForWithdrawal__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__AnnualPremium__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__ApplicationSubmitDate__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__AssetReferenceId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__AutomaticPaymentAmount__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__AutomaticRebalancing__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BenefitPlanId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillDeliveryMethod__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingAccountId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingCity__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingContactId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingCountry__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingEmail__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingFrequency__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingMethod__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingPostalCode__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingState__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__BillingStreet__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__CarrierId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__CashSurrenderValue__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__CashValue__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__CostBasis__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__DaysToExpire__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__DeathBenefit__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__EffectiveDate__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__EffectiveTerm__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__ExpirationDate__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__FaceAmount__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__GuaranteedDeathBenefit__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__GuaranteePeriod__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__InceptionDate__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__InitialDeposit__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__IsAutomaticPaymentEnabled__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__JSONAttribute__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__Jurisdiction__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__LineofBusiness__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__OpenClaimCount__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__ParentItemId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__PaymentMethodId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__PolicyAssetId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__PrimaryProducerId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__ProvisioningStatus__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__QualifiedType__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__RatePlan__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__RateState__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__RootItemId__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__SourceOfFunds__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__Term__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__TotalPremiumForTerm__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__TotalValue__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__Type__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__UnitofFaceAmount__c, 
%vlocity_namespace%__ValuePerUnit__c 
FROM Asset  where  AccountId =  '{{params.id}}'

%vlocity_namespace%__Description__c: Account PolicyAssets Personal Lines, Life and Annuity Layout
Name: Account-PolicyAssets-lwc
